headline: Corrections & Amplifications
summary: CORRECTIONS  Hewlett Packard Enterprise hired Arthur Schwartz, a political strategist close to Donald J. Trump Jr., to advise it. A U.S. News article on Thursday about U.S. antitrust investigations incorrectly said that Live Nation and HPE both hired Schwartz.

raw.headline: Corrections & Amplifications
raw.summary: CORRECTIONS  Hewlett Packard Enterprise hired Arthur Schwartz, a political strategist close to Donald J. Trump Jr., to advise it. A U.S. News article on Thursday about U.S. antitrust investigations incorrectly said that Live Nation and HPE both hired Schwartz.

headline: Semperis Appoints Randall Belknap to Lead U.S. Federal Sales and Partner Strategy
summary: Semperis, a provider of AI-powered identity-security and cyber resilience, today announced the appointment of Randall Belknap as head of U.S. Federal Sales. A seasoned executive with more than 30 years of experience in federal enterprise software sales, Belknap will lead Semperis' public sector go-to-market strategy, drive strategic growth in U.S. federal accounts, and oversee the expansion of the company's federal partner network and channel distribution initiatives.

raw.headline: Semperis Appoints Randall Belknap to Lead U.S. Federal Sales and Partner Strategy

headline: NCR Voyix (VYX) Tops Q2 Earnings and Revenue Estimates
summary: NCR Voyix (VYX) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of +35.71% and +3.02%, respectively, for the quarter ended June 2025. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: HPE got tangled in MAGA conspiracy theories and now its $14 billion merger with Juniper could be thrown out
summary: The feeling was that a combined HPE-Juniper offering would act as a “bulwark” against Huawei in markets where the Chinese company might otherwise be more dominant.

raw.headline: HPE got tangled in MAGA conspiracy theories and now its $14 billion merger with Juniper could be thrown out

headline: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) Partners With Kyndryl To Enhance AI Cloud Solutions
summary: Hewlett Packard Enterprise (HPE) recently expanded its global alliance with Kyndryl to bolster AI services through HPE Private Cloud AI, collaborating with NVIDIA to offer enterprise solutions. This announcement coincided with a 19% rise in the company’s stock over the last quarter, aligning with broader market gains characterized by rising indices like the S&P 500 and Nasdaq. HPE's strategic moves, such as its cooperation agreement with Elliott Investment Management and product-related...
